title: Unable to reboot pixel 2. Stuck with screen on
content:
Hello, 
My pixel 2 randomly turned off last night and showed the logo as if it was initializing. It got stuck there until today, and I am unable to reboot it or do anything. I have tried holding the power bottom plus volume down but anything I choose in the menu doesn't work. 

I get this info:

Bootloader: mw8998-002.0076.00
Baseband:g8998-00008-1902121845
product revision: walleye MP1
serial number: HT7BR1A02906
UFS: 64GB SAMSUNG
DRAM: 4096MB Micron LPDDR4
Boot-sloot: a
Console: DISABLED
Secure Boot: yes (PRODUCTION)
Device State: locked

If I select recovery mode it shows the android laying down and a "no command" message.

Any advice?
